1486180.name: Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup
1486180.description:
Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup is an all-ages adventure following the young Pup and their astronaut grandfather Pap. The stranded pair investigate a dangerous world. A retro RPG with a modern pace about the seasons of life.

KEY FEATURES
-A unique story-driven experience following Pap & Pup.
-Fun mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics.
-Hand drawn cutscenes inspired from comic book art.
-A bitesize length for those with limited playtime.
-Great music and voice cast.
-Plenty of secrets!

CONTROLS
As simple as arrow keys, Escape, and Return/Enter.
Or, go controller.
